item.title: Subjects that Help Building Cyber Security Skills while you are Studying
item.description: Whats up guys eh, long time and i haven’t posted anything recently. Yeah i know i have been busy with a ton of work at the company where we have been doing something amazing almost every day. Recently, we have been working on various cutting-edge vulnerability research and product development projects and my end of the day is like never-ending. Anyways, there have been many students asking me one common question every time i login to facebook or any other social media that “I am a B.
